title: Dewdrop Diamond Studs - Kanti Butalu
features: Teardrop (Mango) shaped design with a filigree-inspired setting. The diamonds are pavé set within the gold frame, maximizing sparkle. Lightweight and comfortable for daily wear, yet elegant enough for special occasions. The pierced design allows light to pass through, enhancing the diamond's brilliance.
occasions: Valentine's Day gifts. Can also complement traditional South Indian attire for smaller functions.
description: These elegant Diamond Studs are a perfect blend of contemporary design and traditional craftsmanship. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, lasting luster. The high-quality diamonds ensure exceptional brilliance. They are lightweight and versatile, making them ideal for daily wear or for adding a touch of sparkle to any occasion. Represents sophistication and refined taste.
